isis.stitle: TSI 05-12-31 - Horton Fan Drive Diagnostics for All Truck Models Built Starting January, 1990 to Present

subjectgroup.subject: Horton Fan Drive Diagnostics for All Truck Models Built Starting January, 1990 to Present

geninfo.para: When diagnosing a Horton HTS or Horton DriveMaster fan drive it is important to use the following Troubleshooting Guides to properly diagnose the failure. It is important to understand the root cause of the failure to insure that the same failure does not reoccur on the replacement fan drive.

svcproc.title: Service procedure

warning.para: To avoid property damage, personal injury, or death, park the vehicle on a flat level surface, set the parking brake, turn the engine off, and chock the wheels.

svcproc.para: Refer to the pdf for this TSI for the Troubleshooting Guides.
